about_the_game:
Game Introduction
Welcome to prank loop, a unique gaming experience that combines thrilling and humorous elements! You and your friends are both loyal fans of Cai Xukun. In the happy moments of playing games together every day, this day suddenly becomes different. Your friend decided to scare you through a prank, but ended up falling and getting injured. Due to the intervention of some mysterious force, this day keeps resetting, but only you have preserved the memory. You must use every loop to find a way to prevent your friend from falling and ultimately fulfill their prank plan.
Game features
Unique cycle mechanism: Experience the cycle of time reset, gradually solving the puzzle of preventing friends from falling.
Combining Fun and Thrilling: Adding humorous elements to a tense and stimulating atmosphere, allowing you to constantly switch between shock and laughter.
Multiple solutions: Nearly a hundred different props and strategies, each attempt will bring new surprises and challenges.
Exquisite visual effects: High quality graphics and animations immerse you in the world of gaming.
Profound Friendship Story: Explore the true essence of friendship and help your friend realize their prank dreams.
How to play:
You need to find various props and methods to prevent your friend from falling while they are playing pranks. Every failure will reset time, and you must find the right solution in a continuous loop. When you ultimately succeed, you will unlock more interesting achievements and see your friends smiling as they wish.
First mover experience:
The game is still under development and I will experience many interesting bugs in the early stages, but it will become less and less in the future! So buying early can experience more bugs
Kind reminder, if you encounter a bug that falls out of the world space or gets stuck, you can press Alt+F4 to exit the game!
The final tip
Be cautious when playing pranks to avoid hurting yourself. Are you ready to experience a thrilling and hilarious adventure in prank cycle?
Add to your wish list now and prepare for the endless cycle of challenges!

name: SaveKunkun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windos10
  • Processor: I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce mx150
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windos10
  • Processor: I7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Dive into horror-comedy with SaveKunkun. Play as an IKUN fan stuck in a time loop, remembering each reset. When a prank injures your friend, prevent their fall using over 100 methods. Explore time's mysteries, uncover friend's intentions, and save them.
